meanings.definition: A person who is professionally qualified to prepare and dispense medicinal drugs.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacists at the store helped me find the right medicine.
meanings.sent2: Pharmacists play a crucial role in ensuring patients receive the correct medications.
meanings.sent3: The pharmacists joked that they could create a potion to cure all ailments.
meanings.sent4: She was like a magician, the way the pharmacists mixed the ingredients to make the medicine.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the friendly smile of the pharmacists as they handed me my prescription.

meanings.definition: A person who is licensed to practice pharmacy.
meanings.sent1: My cousin is studying hard to become one of the pharmacists in our town.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacists in the hospital work long hours to ensure patients receive their medications on time.
meanings.sent3: The group of pharmacists decided to open a pharmacy together and help the community.
meanings.sent4: The pharmacists were like guardians, protecting people's health with their knowledge.
meanings.sent5: I admire the dedication of pharmacists in their commitment to helping others stay healthy.
